Key Match Events: Musiala (22') and Gundogan (67') scored for Germany
Rudiger (27') and Mittelstadt (89') scored for Germany
Varga (22'), Rossi (90+3'), and Szoboszlai (90+3') scored for Hungary
Pre-Game Insights: Hungary head coach Marco Rossi is still sweating over a pair of fitness doubts ahead of Wednesday's Euro 2024 Group A clash with Germany
Hungary are at risk of seeing their top-two dreams evaporate early thanks to a 3-1 loss to Switzerland at the weekend
Hungary should line up in their recognisable 3-4-2-1 shape from the first whistle
Post-Match Reflections: Hungary's top-two dreams are in jeopardy after the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Mercedes-Benz-Arena in Germany
The match was part of Euro 2024 Group A
Others: Hungary's possible starting lineup: Gulacsi; Orban, Lang, Szalai; Bolla, Nagy, Schafer, Kerkez; Sallai, Szoboszlai; Varga
